name: BCDConverter
0:
”Alexa, open B. C. D. Converter”
”Alexa, ask B. C. D. Converter what's 42”
”Alexa, ask B. C. D. Converter what's 971”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: b. c. d. converter
des: This is an Alexa skill for converting decimal numbers into binary coded decimals (BCD)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
